snippet: The Iraqis flew Columbus’s Justin Meram in business class to Chinese Taipai for a World Cup qualifier, then left him sitting on the bench without an explanation.
abstract: Profile of Justin Meram, only American-born player on Iraq's national soccer team, who is recovering from deep disappointment after being turned down by Iran for spot in World Cup qualifying match; Meram says he is trying to put his confusion and uncertainty aside, and focus on returning to MLS's Columbus Crew in time to face Red Bulls in first leg of Eastern Conference finals.
lead_paragraph: The Iraqis flew Columbus’s Justin Meram in business class to Chinese Taipai for a World Cup qualifier, then left him sitting on the bench without an explanation.

headline.main: Long Way for a Snub in a Qualifying Match
headline.print_headline: Long Way for a Snub in a Qualifying Match
